headline: Hasbro CEO’s Good News: Christmas ‘Is Going to Happen’
summary: Toymaker Hasbro will be able to navigate tariffs relatively smoothly, said chief executive Chris Cocks.  “I think the important thing on tariffs is Christmas is going to happen,” Cocks said during The Wall Street Journal's Future of Everything event in New York.  The toy industry sources about 80% of its products from China, but Hasbro derives about half of its U.S. toy and game volume from China.
